com.observability.monitoring.server

Class DaemonHeartbeatMain

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.observability.monitoring.server.DaemonHeartbeatMain
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class DaemonHeartbeatMain
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable
    DaemonHeartbeatMain is a process that runs in the server. Functionalities
    1. Keeps in a list of daemons that is supposed to send heartbeat.
    2. Listens to all the heartbeats from the daemons.
    3. Cross checks to find out which daemons did not respond and which daemons is having trouble collecting metrics.
    Author:
    Prasanth Nair
    Created June 5 2015
